{"id":1479776031,"question_id":3555,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1734307817,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1479776031/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Final Array State After K Multiplication Operations I","memory":"27.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> getFinalState(vector<int>& nums, int k, int multiplier) {\n        vector<int> rets(nums.size(), 0);\n        priority_queue<pair<int,int>, vector<pair<int,int>>, greater<>> pq;\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); i++)\n            pq.push({nums[i], i});\n        int i=0;\n        while(i<k) {\n            pair<int, int> t = pq.top();\n            pq.pop();\n            pq.push({t.first*multiplier, t.second});\n            i++;\n        }\n        while(!pq.empty()){\n            pair<int, int> t = pq.top();\n            pq.pop();\n            rets[t.second] = t.first;\n        };\n        return rets;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"final-array-state-after-k-multiplication-operations-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
